changeSet.author: CWDS TPT-3 Team
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "SYS_CD_C" ( "SYS_ID" SMALLINT , "CATEGORYID" SMALLINT , "INACTV_IND" CHAR(1) , "OTHER_CD" CHAR(2) , "SHORT_DSC" CHAR(40) , "LGC_ID" CHAR(4) , "LST_UPD_ID" CHAR(3) , "LST_UPD_TS" TIMESTAMP , "THIRD_ID" CHAR(10) , "FKS_META_T" CHAR(8) , "LONG_DSC" CHAR(160) )
